alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Rains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:57AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hopkins and Rains Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 656 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Point, or 18 miles northeast of Wills Point, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sulphur Springs, Emory, East Tawakoni, Point, Como, Lake Sulphur Springs, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Fork Reservoir, Pine Forest, Martin Springs, Weaver, Flora, Flats, Cornersville, Hermits Cove and Dike. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 119 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for north central Texas.
